title: Number of homeless residents in Los Angeles County jumps by 9% in annual count
description: The number of homeless residents counted in Los Angeles County has spiked again, increasing by 9% since last year

title: At least 13 dead in Texas as scorching temps continue
description: At least 13 people have died from heat-related illness in Texas as much of the South grapples with a weeks-long heat wave with triple-digit temperatures.

title: Gene therapy for severe hemophilia is approved by FDA
description: U.S. health regulators have approved a gene therapy for the most common form of hemophilia

title: Drone deployed to fight mosquitoes in Southern California
description: Southern California is seeing a spike in the region’s mosquito population following winter's heavy rains, and drone technology is being used to combat the potential spread of disease

title: Parkland school cop who allegedly fled shooting found not guilty on all counts
description: Scot Peterson, the ex-Parkland resource officer accused of allegedly failing to confront the school shooter, has been found not guilty.

title: Fire breaks out at Tiffany & Co.'s flagship NYC store
description: An underground transformer caught fire Thursday morning, the New York City Fire Department said.

title: WATCH:  This bagel shop asked customers to do a ‘silly dance’ when they entered
description: We’ll dance for our bagels any day.

title: Biden hits SCOTUS affirmative action ruling: 'Discrimination still exists in America'
description: "This is not a normal court," Biden said, when asked if it had gone "rogue."

title: Saying strike is "imminent," UPS gets a Friday deadline from union to come up with a better contract
description: Frustrated by an “appalling counterproposal” earlier this week, the head of the union representing 340,000 UPS workers said a strike is imminent and gave the shipping giant a Friday deadline to improve its offer

title: Bed Bath & Beyond lives on!(line). Overstock.com buys rights to bankrupt retailer and changes name
description: Overstock

title: Was your flight canceled amid bad weather? What you need to know about rebooking, refunds and more
description: Hundreds of thousands of air travelers are facing potential flight cancellations and delays this weekend, the peak of summer travel, as thunderstorms threaten the East Coast, West Coast and points in between

title: Driver lost control of tanker truck on off ramp before I-95 collapse, officials say
description: The driver of a tanker truck hauling gasoline lost control on a curved off-ramp on Interstate 95, causing the truck to flip and catch fire, leading to the collapse of the northbound lanes in early June

title: Pirates-Padres game delayed 45 minutes due to poor air quality from wildfires
description: A game between the Pittsburgh Pirates and San Diego Padres was delayed 45 minutes Thursday due to poor air conditions caused by lingering smoke from wildfires in Canada

title: Charges dropped in fatal stabbing of homeless man on subway
description: Criminal charges against 20-year-old Jordan Williams in the fatal stabbing of a 32-year-old New York City homeless man on the subway.

title: NFL suspends 3 players indefinitely for violating gambling policy
description: The NFL suspended three players indefinitely Thursday for violating the league’s gambling policy and a fourth was sidelined for six games

title: Paris-area town imposes overnight curfew in response to rioting
description: French prosecutors say a police officer in a Paris suburb has been handed a preliminary charge of voluntary homicide after the deadly shooting of a 17-year-old that triggered two nights of riots

title: US economy actually grew 2% over first quarter, up from prior 1.3% estimate
description: Major revision of data marks the latest sign of resilient economic performance.

title: WATCH:  Orcas swim side-by-side off California coast
description: A photographer captured orcas socializing like "kids at a playground" off the coast of California. Researchers aboard had “never experienced an encounter like this,” the photographer says.

title: Over 1,000 evacuees return to Arizona homes with brush fire now 30% contained
description: More than 1,000 people have returned to their homes in the Phoenix suburb of Scottsdale after firefighters declared a brush fire to be 30% contained

title: Virgin Galactic live updates: Company has launched 1st fully commercial spaceflight
description: Virgin Galactic announced it is sending four people into space Thursday for a 90-minute suborbital spaceflight.

title: 3 men who funded Trump-acquired social media company charged with insider trading
description: Three men who funded the company that became Donald Trump's Truth Social platform have been charged with insider trading.

title: University of Idaho murders house to be torn down despite families' calls to postpone
description: The University of Idaho house where four students were killed is set to be demolished despite calls from victims' families to postpone until after the suspect's trial.

title: Supreme Court sets new limits on affirmative action programs in landmark ruling
description: The majority opinion was written by Chief Justice John Roberts.

title: Suspect charged in alleged attack on Muslim lawmaker after Eid prayer service: Police
description: Hartford police have made an arrest after Connecticut state Rep. Maryam Khan was allegedly assaulted by a man while she attended a gathering for Eid al-Adha prayers.

title: Woman's leg is amputated after being trapped under a moving walkway in a Thai airport
description: A woman's leg has been amputated in a Thai airport after it was trapped by a movable walkway

title: WATCH:  Man finds himself the only passenger on commercial flight
description: Phil Stringer got personalized safety annoucments.

title: Chinese spy balloon used American-made parts, did not transmit data: Officials
description: The Chinese spy balloon that was shot down over the Atlantic Ocean in early February was built -- at least partly -- using American off-the-shelf parts.

title: Dog alerts couple of alligator in their Louisiana home
description: A Louisiana couple recently woke up to a surprise when they discovered an alligator in their home.

title: 150 arrested across France in 2nd night of riots after police fatally shoot teen
description: A 17-year-old driver was shot and killed by a police officer during a traffic check in the Paris suburb of Nanterre on Tuesday morning, sparking violent protests.

title: Judges open ‘voluntary homicide’ after a teen was killed by police
description: A French prosecutor says judges have opened an investigation for ‘voluntary homicide’ after a teen was killed by police

title: UK appeals court rules that plan to send asylum seekers to Rwanda is unlawful
description: A British court has ruled that a government plan to send asylum-seekers to Rwanda in an attempt to deter migrants from making risky journeys across the English Channel is unlawful

title: As Trump faces charges, here are 27 people he's said should be indicted or jailed
description: As former President Trump faces criminal charges while seeking another term in the White House, here are 27 people he's previously said should be indicted or behind bars.

title: 2 students and a professor stabbed during gender issues class: Police
description: Two students and a university professor were stabbed during a class on gender issues, police said.

title: Yankees pitcher Domingo Germán throws perfect game, the 24th in MLB history
description: Domingo Germán of the New York Yankees has pitched the 24th perfect game in major league history, retiring every Oakland batter in an 11-0 victory over the Athletics

title: Mississippi deputies fired after Black man was shot in the face during drug raid
description: Months after a January drug raid that left a Black man with a gunshot wound, the Rankin County Sheriff’s Department announced five of its deputies have been fired.

title: WATCH:  Delta flight makes emergency landing without gear
description: A Delta plane landed safely at Charlotte Douglas International Airport Wednesday morning without its front landing gear.

title: 3 people stabbed in Canada university building and police say a person is detained
description: Canadian police say three people were stabbed in a university classroom in the Canadian city of Waterloo and a person has been taken into custody

title: NYC's ex-school food chief convicted in bribery case tied to icky chicken tenders
description: A man who oversaw food service for New York City schools has been convicted in a bribery case that picked apart how chicken tenders riddled with bone and bits of metal were served for months

title: Shootout outside US consulate in Saudi port city leaves assailant and security guard dead, US says
description: The State Department says a gunman who opened fire on the U.S. consulate in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, and a local security guard working at the consulate were killed in an exchange of fire

title: Police board votes to fire officers involved in arrest that left man paralyzed
description: The New Haven Board of Police Commissioners voted to terminate two police officers for their alleged conduct in the 2022 arrest of Randy Cox, which left him paralyzed.
